name: Ant Climb
description:
Costas: Concept, Code

Cindy: Asset Creation, UI

In Ant Climb, your objective is to reach the very top of the tree by jumping onto the falling leaves while avoiding (or eliminating) the buzzing flies that get in your way. Fight back by using your twig to throw at the flies!

How to play:

Simply put, tap the space bar to perform a single jump. To throw a twig at the flies, press and hold the space bar for 3 seconds approximately. Holding down the space bar also allows you to jump higher at regular intervals.
